backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, components, hooks, utilities, and configuration.
frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_PUBLISHING.md: Guide for publishing the Skylance Royale PWA to Google Play using a TWA wrapper with required assets and steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind root theme variable definitions for light/dark modes plus global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing metadata, manifest link, icons, fonts, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app identity, theme, orientation, and icon set for Skylance Royale.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the BattleGame view inside a full‑screen container.
frontend/src/game/BattleGame.tsx: Main battle game component managing start, pause, resume, and rendering player, enemies, and projectiles.
frontend/src/game/components/GameOverScr: Overlay showing victory/defeat state, kill count, and restart button.
frontend/src/game/components/Hud.tsx: HUD displaying player health, kill counter, and a pause button.
frontend/src/game/components/PauseOverla: Displays a full‑screen pause overlay with a resume button and icon.
frontend/src/game/components/StartScreen: Renders the game's start screen with title, instructions, start button, and optional publish info panel.
frontend/src/game/components/TouchContro: Implements touch joystick movement and a shoot button for mobile controls, handling touch events and normalized movement output.
frontend/src/game/TruckGame.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the old truck game implementation.
frontend/src/game/useBattleGame.ts: Provides the main battle game loop, state management, player/enemy behavior, shooting, and win/lose logic.
frontend/src/game/useTruckGame.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for a truck game implementation.
frontend/src/game/utils/collision.ts: Exports a simple distance-based collision check function.
frontend/src/game/utils/spawn.ts: Handles enemy spawn timing and generates enemies at arena edges while avoiding proximity to the player.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth handling, storing identity, login/clear functions, and exposing auth status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file noting no backend queries are needed for the game.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global variables for light/dark battle themes, base resets, and custom game UI effects like gradients, glows, shadows, and panels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended animations, fonts, container settings, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s versioned state, goals, issues, and required game assets for transitioning the mobile web game toward Play Store release.
